project.name: Semedico Resources Export
project.description: This project employs the JULIE Lab Concept Database Manager to create the resource files required by the semedico UIMA pipeline. In the current state, the project requires the existing Neo4j database built with a previous version of semedico-resource-management. Note that we were unfortunately not able to stabilize semedico-resource-management in a way that the original database could be created again. So at the moment, this project only works with the original concept database.
